title: Adult Learners' Media Utilization Strategies: Integration of Formal/Informal Learning Tools for Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Need to establish a customized learning environment combining formal LMS and informal media tools to strengthen mathematical competencies in corporate non-degree programs.

learning_goals: Learners will distinguish at least three usage scenarios for combining official LMS materials with informal tools like Facebook groups
Learners will implement learning plans combining formal/informal media for math problem-solving with over 80% adherence
Learners will evaluate digital tools with over 75% accuracy by applying learning efficiency criteria

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Notion, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
